document.full_text: phil mickelson will launch his title defense at this week's masters in the company of fellow american peter uihlein and australian geoff ogilvy, in groupings announced on tuesday.
document.title: holder mickelson to tee off in penultimate group
lines_and_colors: phil mickelson will launch his title defense at this week's masters in the company of fellow american peter uihlein and australian geoff ogilvy, in groupings announced on tuesday.
